short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension for quick and easy URL appends and replacements with a click of a button or a tap of a shortcut.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension for quick & easy URL appends and replacements with a click of a button or a tap of a shortcut.
Set your options to append or replace certain text in your browser address bar for easy access to your back-end portals, development and production environments, and URL queries. 
Set exceptions to allow for a range of URL adjustments based on the platforms you work on. Whether it be CMS portals, URL Queries, or URL perimeters this simple extension can help save you time and effort reaching your platforms and result pages. 

For best results set up the extension to run with your preferred keyboard shortcut and select your options in the extension options menu.
